alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 1:32PM CDT until October 31 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Below freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso/Western Hudspeth Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties
